pageProduct.name: Nutra-Life Silicaplex 5000 100 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Nutra-Life® Silicaplex 5000 contains five key ingredients:
- Biotin, to support hair and nail health
- Vitamin C, to support collagen formation
- Zinc to support skin renewal processes
- Vitamin B6 to support healthy immune system function
- Silica, a natural component of horsetail herb

Suitable For: Skin, hair, nails, skin repair, immune system

Size: 100 capsules

KEY FEATURES

• Hair, Skin & Nail Health Support

Warnings

If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional.
Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Ingredients

Each capsule provides
Herbal extract equiv. dry
Equisetum arvense (Horsetail) stem 5g
Vitamins and mineral
Pyridoxine hydrochloride 7.5mg
Equiv. Pyridoxine (Vitamin B6) 6.2mg
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 25mg
Biotin 20µg
Zinc (as gluconate) 4mg
Encapsulating aids, Antioxidant.

Contains: Contains: Animal product, sulfites.

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Dairy| Egg| Gluten| Soy| Wheat

Directions

RECOMMENDED ADULT DOSAGE: Take 2 capsules daily, or as directed by your health professional. If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional.
Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool, dry place below 30°C.
